title: Taylor Swift Went Home & Cried After Losing Album of the Year Grammy in 2014
text: Taylor Swift wears an all black outfit for a night at the recording studio in New York City on Wednesday (October 7). The 25-year-old singer recently opened up in a Grammy Pro interview about losing the Grammy for her album Red back in 2014 and how she went home and cried after the ceremony. “When [...] »
